abort.heater_not_available: Heater not available. Try to reset the heater by pressing + and OK for some seconds.
abort.heater_not_found: Heater not found. Try to move the heater closer to Home Assistant computer.

error.connection_error: Connection failed. Try to move the heater closer to Home Assistant computer. Make sure the blue led on the heater blinks.

user.description: Press and hold OK button on the heater until the blue led starts blinking before pressing Submit. Configure heater might take some minutes.
